meanings.definition: A candle made by dipping the pith of a rush in tallow or melted fat.
meanings.sent1: In the olden days, people would make rushlights by dipping rush pith in melted fat.
meanings.sent2: The rushlights flickered softly, casting a warm glow in the dark room.
meanings.sent3: When the rushlights burned out, the room was plunged into darkness, much to the surprise of the guests.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas were like rushlights, illuminating the path forward in our project.
meanings.sent5: The flickering rushlights created a cozy atmosphere in the rustic cabin.

meanings.definition: A rush stem used as a candle.
meanings.sent1: The rushlights were simple yet effective sources of light in the countryside.
meanings.sent2: She lit the rushlights one by one, brightening up the dimly lit room.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to play with the rushlights, thinking they were some strange kind of plant.
meanings.sent4: His words were like rushlights, guiding her through the maze of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The flickering rushlights danced in the gentle breeze, creating a mesmerizing effect.
